title: Crossword Puzzle Answers
html:
Crossword Puzzle Answers

Across

1. CARO (USA) L.
5. T(R) OPIC.
10. AR (M) REST.
11. ADM-IRA-L (MAD anag.).
12. STA (I) R.
13. RUN (S ALON) G.
14. ME-SHED.
15. HOS(TAG)E.
18. BO (RED) OM.

28. A(LIAS)ES (rev.).

Down

1. CLAUSE (homophone).
2. RAM-PAGE.
3. UNEARTHED (hidden).
4. A(TT)IRED.
6. RUM-B-A.
7. PERSONA (hidden).
8. CO(LOG)NES.
9. L(A)UNCH.
16. SQUAW-KING.
17. A(BRIDGE)D.
19. REP-AIRS.
20. M(AID)EN.
21. BIG-NAME (anag.).
22. A-T ISSUE.
23. LESSON (homophone).
25. N-EARS.
